name: MindManager Map Theme File
summary: An MMAS file contains a diagram theme created by Corel MindManager, a visual diagramming application used to organize ideas, plans, and projects. It stores settings for formatting elements in a "mind map," such as the default font, shape colors, the map background, and the main topic and subtopic shapes. MMAS files may be included with the software or created by the user.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: MMAS file open in Corel MindManager 22
